1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Ix in tan̈vejn̈ej scolval Jehová, axo ix ab'ani ayic ix in tevi d'ay.</t>
2: <t>Ix in yic'q'ueta d'a jun olan te ay smay. Ix in scol b'aj sitz'atac. Ix in yac'anq'ue d'a yib'an̈ jun q'uen q'ueen yic tzin tec'b'ej in b'a.</t>
3: <t>Ix yac' val jun b'it ac'to d'ayin, b'it yic aloj vach' lolonel d'a co Diosal. Comonoc sat sc'ol jantac eb' tz'ilan jun tic, yic syac'och Jehová eb' yipoc sc'ool.</t>
4: <t>Te vach' yic eb' tz'ac'anoch Jehová yipoc sc'ool, max yac'och spensar eb' d'a eb' syic'chaan̈ sb'a, aton eb' tz'och tzac'an d'a spatic juntzan̈ comon dios.</t>
5: <t>Mamin Jehová in Diosal, man̈ jantacoc juntzan̈ tas satub'tac ix a b'o'o yed' jantac a vach'c'olal ix ac' d'ayon̈. Malaj junoc mach syal slajb'an sb'a ed'oc. In gana svalel masanil a vach'c'olal chi', palta max in tzac'vanlaj, yujto man̈xo b'ischajb'enoc.</t>
6: <t>Max a nib'ejlaj noc' noc' yed' ixim trigo silab'il. Malaj noc' noc' tza c'ana' yic sn̈usji silab'il d'ayach, ma silab' yic stupcanel co mul. Palta ix a jac in chiquin yic tzin cha vab' tas tzala'.</t>
7: <t>Yuj chi' ix vala': Tic tzin ja'i, xin chi. A tas tz'ib'ab'ilcan d'a a lolonel, a vab'ixal syala'.</t>
8: <t>Ach in Diosal, snib'ej in c'ool tzin c'ulej icha a gana. Ayoch a c'ayb'ub'al d'a in pensar.</t>
9: <t>Mamin Jehová, ix valcanel yab'ixal a tojolal d'a scal eb' a chon̈ab'. Ojtac val to malaj b'aj ix vactejcan valaneli.</t>
10: <t>Malaj b'aj max valel a tojolal. Ix valel yab'ixal to tz'eln̈ejc'och tas tzala', tzac'anpax colnab'il. Malaj b'aj ix in c'ub'ejel d'a yichan̈ eb' a chon̈ab' molaneq'ui, to te nivan a vach'c'olal, yeln̈ej pax tzala'.</t>
11: <t>Mamin Jehová, ayocab'n̈ej oq'uelc'olal d'ayin. Ilinn̈ej yed' a vach'c'olal icha ix aj alani.</t>
12: <t>Yujto te ay tas sjavi d'a vib'an̈, maxtzac b'ischajlaj vuuj. In yamchajelta yuj in chucal. Ichato maxtzac yal-laj vilani. Ec'b'al in chucal chi' d'a yichan̈ sb'isul xil in jolom. Vanxo somchajel in c'ool.</t>
13: <t>Mamin, cotan̈ val q'uelan d'ayin, cotan̈, colineli. Cotan̈ elan̈chamel, tzach och ved'oc.</t>
14: <t>A eb' sgana in smilanchamoc, javocab' q'uixvelal yed' somc'olal d'a yib'an̈ eb'. B'atocab' eb' elelal d'a scal nivac q'uixvelal, yujto sgana eb' yac'an chucal d'ayin.</t>
15: <t>A eb' tzin b'uchani, canocab' eb' d'a man̈ pensaril yuj somc'olal.</t>
16: <t>Axo masanil eb' ayoch spensar d'ayach, tzalajocab' eb' d'ayach. Te nivan elc'och ach Jehová, xchiocab' eb' snib'an a colval.</t>
17: <t>A inxo jun, ob'iltac in, ay in och d'a ilc'olal. Mamin, mocab' in b'atcan satc'olal uuj. A ach tzach ochtaxon ved'oc yic tzin a colani. Ach Jehová in Diosal, man̈ iq'uec' tiempo in a colani.</t>
